description:
This course explains the different ways to recover lost data from our databases. This course allows you to learn step by step procedure to track the data which can be easily understandable to anyone who have basic knowledge on database concepts. I have also provided much bonus content at the end of this course to learn more and practice.

The Topics which I discussed in this course are a bit high level and Admin level activities. But don't worry. It does not matter whether you are beginner or expert. It is very user friendly. This course is well planned and designed to allow all the levels of database folks very easily and quickly.

I have made this course with many features like, quizzes, coding exercises, bonus content etc... Most importantly I have published a complete reference hand book for your reference.

I hope this course helps you...

Note: This course is the Part 1 of my module 'Database recovery techniques'. I am going to publish the part II soon...

Enjoy the course & ALL THE BEST
title: Data Recovery Techniques Part - I
